title: ***TRADED*** FS/FT: T3 Turkey Red - Joe Tinker (HOF)
author: DerekMichael

posts.post_title: ***TRADED*** FS/FT: T3 Turkey Red - Joe Tinker (HOF)
posts.post_content:
I have found a package for this card that I am satisfied with and have traded it away.

I would like to sincerely thank everyone who submitted trade proposals as well as offers. If there is one thing net54 is never short on, it is the BST action. Love it!

Thank you.

Derek

Email sent regarding Tinker.

TED Z
